title: COLOR STARTER Giant Coloring Poster for Kids & Adults, Large Map of the World, Poster to Color for Kids, Jumbo Tabletop Coloring Page, Classroom Art, Homeschooling Art Project, Made in USA, 3'x2'
features: COLORING POSTER PLAY AND LEARN EXPERIENCE - Contains a large format poster sized 3’ x 2’, a paper doodle art poster to color that makes coloring both fun, and educational.
MAP OF THE WORLD WITH CONTINENTS AND OCEANS - custom hand drawn art helps kids remember continent & ocean names, land & ocean shapes, iconic landmarks, and culture.

EXCELLENT WITH ALL MEDIA - Giant coloring sheet is great with markers, colored pencils, crayons, watercolor and water based child safe paints. High quality paper won’t bleed or run. Use as wall or table poster.
IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS - ages 2+, perfect for Halloween, Christmas, Birthdays and a great kid’s classroom or homeschooling project. Coloring sheet is great to entertain when alone or in groups.

HUGE POSTERS MADE IN USA - with 100% recycled materials, nontoxic inks and thick high-quality paper. We are so confident you’ll enjoy the poster, we stand behind it with a 100% manufacturer’s guarantee.
description: Immersive Play-and-Learn experience, it’s not just a coloring poster

Large coloring page unfolds to a giant 3’ x 2’ table top, floor or wall size that can be used at home, in the classroom or as a club activity in groups. Help kids learn continent names, shapes, and oceans along with iconic worldwide culture and landmarks.
Works great with crayons, markers, colored pencils, child safe paints and watercolor.
High quality, made-in-USA with 100% recycled materials, nontoxic inks and high quality durable heavy duty paper
Great gift, party activity, or decorative poster for child’s room, ages 2+
✔ Great gift for the whole family!
100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION - 30-days money back guarantee; no questions asked.
